snippet: Gov. Paul LePage, a Republican, reignited a firestorm on Thursday when, for the second time, he compared the Internal Revenue Service to the Gestapo.
abstract: Maine Gov Paul LePage reignites a firestorm by comparing the Internal Revenue Service to the Gestapo for a second time; Democrats have suggested that LePage, a Republican, is not fit to hold office and IRS workers have asked for an apology.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Paul LePage, a Republican, reignited a firestorm on Thursday when, for the second time, he compared the Internal Revenue Service to the Gestapo.

headline.main: Maine: Governor Compares I.R.S. to Gestapo, Again
headline.print_headline: Maine: Governor Compares I.R.S. To Gestapo, Again
